channel.title: [PI] How to add a Animation to a itemclick?
channel.description: How would i add a animation to a item click! such as c.startanim(###); somehting like that? how would i do it on a pi

item.title: [PI] How to add a Animation to a itemclick?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“master laake, post:5, topic:410331”]im superyou have commented on all my posts today and nothing that you say works or is close to what i want!
i want to call the animation to happen when the item is clicked! i need to know what the call saying for a animation is! not where to put it[/quote][quote=“imsuperman05, post:4, topic:410331”]ClickItem.java?

case ITEMID: c.startAnimation(ID); break;[/quote]
Clickitem.java, Wtf are you asking for?

[size=14pt]c.startAnimation(ID);[/size]

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to add a Animation to a itemclick?

item.source: [PI] How to add a Animation to a itemclick?

item.title: [PI] How to add a Animation to a itemclick?
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

it would either be c.startAnimation(###); or c.getPA().startAnimation(###);

Try looking in the files to see how it’s already called by other things, such as teleports or drinking potions.

Btw, if you want to be drunk when drinking a beer, assuming you already have the beer consumable in your server, you will have to declare the stand, walk and run animation to the new ID. Search in the file that sets the weapons stand and walk animations to see how it’s first called, then add it underneath the message that says (“You drink the beer and feel dizzy.”);

Sorry I can’t be more specific, I don’t use PI.

Read full topic
